data.title: U.S. Dollar (USD) to Nicaraguan córdoba (NIO) Exchange Rate & Converter
data.meta_description: Convert from U.S. Dollar (USD) to  Nicaraguan córdoba (NIO) and vice versa. Historical exchange rates and charts.
data.text:
Convert U.S. Dollar (USD) to Nicaraguan córdoba (NIO)

1 U.S. Dollar = 36.6726 Nicaraguan córdoba

Nicaraguan córdoba recorded today about 36.67 for every 1 U.S. Dollar.

Following are currency exchange calculator and the details of exchange rates between U.S. Dollar (USD) and Nicaraguan córdoba (NIO).

Enter the amount of money to be converted from U.S. Dollar (USD) to Nicaraguan córdoba (NIO), it is converted as you type. Also, you can convert in the reverse direction (from NIO to USD).
